author: jonl
msg: Added FormComponent.isValueNullable() method and removed hardwired check for AbstractTextField in RequiredValidator and associated TODO comment.  I'm taking that TODO on faith that CheckBox, CheckBoxMultipleChoice and RadioChoice are the only other nullable components that need to return true for isValueNullable().
